sourcesContent:
import "../css/convert.css"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; function Convert() { let [Dollarmoney, setDollarMoney] = useState(0); let [Rupeesmoney, setRupeesMoney] = useState(0); function convertDollar() { let dollar = document.getElementById("dollar").value; setDollarMoney(82.44 * dollar); } function convertRupees() { let rupees = document.getElementById("rupees").value; setRupeesMoney(rupees/82.44); } return (
$ {Dollarmoney} ₹
$ {Rupeesmoney} $
℃ {celcius} ℃
℉ {Rupeesmoney} ℃
); } export default Convert;
